snippet.title: N.O.V.A. 2 - "The Hero Rises Again" Teaser Video
snippet.description:
THEY are coming! Prepare for the new battle. Follow the leader.
This is N.O.V.A. 2 Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance! Coming soon!

Stay tuned on http://twitter.com/NOVA_fps and visit http://www.near-orbit-vanguard-alliance.com

N.O.V.A. Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance is available on the App Store: http://j.mp/novagame

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
